review: Value for money. Great simple food and nice owner. We had grilled jumbo prawns, calamari and fish. We were off season but all the food was very fresh

Amazing family run restaurant. The grilled fish and vegetable curry was delicious and would highly recommend.
We visited a few times and enjoyed everything we had.
Julie & Philip

Located in uppuvelli Beach, the place could have been  leaner and better maintained. Ambience is definitely needs improvements, so does the hygiene. Veg buffet was good. Non veg dish ordered was too spicy and not edible. Price too high too. The online reviews are misleading...as the place is over rat as the place is over rated.

We have visited Uperveli several times and Nina's is definitely the best place to eat. There may be a wait as all the food is cooked to order but it's definitely worth the wait. Nina their 7 year old daughter will keep you entertained. We...had breakfast and dinner here for a week and definitely recommend you to try it. The masala dhosa for breakfast are some of the best we have ever had. The owner and his wife are delightful people and will do anything to help y had breakfast and dinner here for a week and definitely recommend you to try it. The masala dhosa for breakfast are some of the best we have ever had. The owner and his wife are delightful people and will do anything to help you.
Quite expensive compared to other restaurants nearby (even 1.5 x our hotel restaurant). No beer or any alcohol possible. Food reasonable but had much better at o the er places.

Nina’s restaurant serves fantastic, fresh and reasonably priced food! Everything is made fresh to order, the service from the family is wonderful, and the spice level is made to order. We returned multiple times during our stay in Trinco and particularly loved the breakfast and...fresh juic fresh juices!

What a nice place to eat something! Run by a lovely family who prepare delicious dishes, all fresh. Even the smoothies & fruitdrinks. Nice to see how enthusiastic they are. We had to wait a while because there was a large group before us. Accompanied...by many apologies, everyone received a cup of popcorn to ease the wait. How sweet is that! Recommended if you are in Trinco/Uppuve by many apologies, everyone received a cup of popcorn to ease the wait. How sweet is that! Recommended if you are in Trinco/Uppuveli!
We arrived just after 2 pm as she was laying out the curries for the rice and curry selection. It was awesome. Cute little boys too.
It was a super experience with Nina. the owners are the sweetest people ever and help with anything you ask. The food was very tasty and very enjoyable.

It was an excellent place for a meal if you are nearby. Good value for money. Nina was very friendly and helpful. It is a restaurant managed by a local family and the meals are super tasty. And you can also have juices as you...want too. Highly recommende want too. Highly recommended!!
We had the fish platter, the grilled fish was absolutely delicious, the chips were great but  the sides of rice and salad were a bit disappointing. A bit more love on the sides and this is 10/10

We dined  2 nights in a row as we found the meals to be really tasty and friendly service, prices very reasonable and BYO. We had the prawns which were good and I tried the rice and chicken  curry one night and the vegetable Fried...Rice which was really go Rice which was really good.
Delicious food & very friendly persons - highly recommended if you are in Trincomalee! After asking about the traditional spices, they even offered us instructions on how to prepare them.

Wonderful and accomodating service. Heaps of vego and vegan options
Very well priced
Supporting a local family

Visited as family of 4.
Very friendly welcome, happy to adjust spice of curry to suit each family member. The food we had was wonderful. Felt very authentic. Busy restaurant. Definitely worth a visit

Lovely beach bar which served amazing Omlette and salads. We went here for lunch and loved it.

Friendly staff, decent menu and a really reasonable price.

We had Lunch at the New Tonic’s and the Kotthu was really good. They also added a dash of lime
To the fresh Mango Juice which was served in a surprisingly big reusable Jar. On request also without a straw, which we found unusual in...Uppuveli Beach. The food came fast and was tasty. Don’t worry about the missing the sign from the beach: just look between Angel Diving and Sri Lanka Diving Tours. Head straight to the bar without a sign and ask for the menu Uppuveli Beach. A great location right on the beach marred by incredibly uncomfortable furniture, the fact they don’t have cold beer (!) or even water available(!!) You don’t come to this part of the world for good service but it is bad here even by local standards....Disappoint Disappointing
Delicious lunch, Friendly staff, One of the best restaurant in Uppuveli beach to hang out with friends and family.

New Tonic's Restaurant is worth every penny for the enchanting nights it offers by the beach. With its mesmerizing ocean view, delectable cuisine, and magical ambiance, it provides an experience that exceeds expectations. From the moment you arrive until the last sip of your refreshing...cocktail, you'll be captivated by the blissful atmosphere. Embrace the coastal charm, indulge in the sumptuous dishes, and immerse yourself in an unforgettable dining experience that justifies its val cocktail, you'll be captivated by the blissful atmosphere. Embrace the coastal charm, indulge in the sumptuous dishes, and immerse yourself in an unforgettable dining experience that justifies its value.
If your pockets are lined with gold come here. The most expensive place I've eaten at in this town. 9350 rupees for two beers and two squid and chips. No  credit card services
Very high quality service. Staff is kind and very professional. Very delicious foods worth for money.
Hi my name is kumar I went to this place with my family  their service and food was excellent Talking politely👍
Superb food and well trained staff. Very friendly and quick service .amazing sea view. 100% worth of money

+ fantastic location right on the beach. One of the few with beds on the beach (if not the only one)..
- nice and quiet owner. employee in the restaurant somewhat intrusive.
Nice food hospitality staff nice beach view nice view different food enjoy s food enjoying place wonderful in sri lanka

We had lunch and dinner here many times during our East Coast stay.Food and drink was good with lovely staff.
Excellent location to explore this unspoilt coastline.

Juice is diluted with tapwater, tastes like soil. Fried Rice and tjap tjoi was tasteless and full of black chips from blackening in the pan. Staff is unwelcoming, unfriendly and rude. Way to expensive for Sri lankan standards. Tried to rip us off with the...beer, asked more than it actually costs..

Eating here will cost you a year of your life, don't go. Just walk a while down the beach to the north (turn left) till you reach beachroad, many friendly restaurants he beer, asked more than it actually costs..

The first impression is that they dont seem interested in having clients and treating them with a smile and a welcoming attitude. No hello, no thanks, and after throwing the money on the table, no goodbye.
The food is normal and the price is good....They have a good variety on the menu.
Still a long way to learn how to run a restaura They have a good variety on the menu.
Still a long way to learn how to run a restaurant!

Don't book your accomadation in Nilaveli in advance, you can stay stay at Nilaweili Beach Bar And Restaurant, as the service is so slow, that no one will notice if you take a nap. Expect at least one hour waiting for very basic food!

Before anything, the staff was unwelcoming. Then of course, who is to judge the Beach Bar on a simple subjective impression? Maybe they were having a bad day, that's all.
However, we genuinely felt like we were bothering them when we politely ordered 4 fresh...juices. But then, maybe they had just finished cleaning the juicer, that's all.

After a while, our juices finally arrived! Oh we couldn't wait to get a taste of...the wrong fruits. Not only had they mixed up the order but it also felt like they had diluted each one with water. Fine fine fine, maybe we hadn't been clear enough when ordering—although we'd repeated the full order 3 times, just to be sure. Moreover, when I pointed out that they had juiced the wrong fruits, the waiter just looked straight at me in disbelief; to which I awkwardly replied with a quick "Nevermind, this will do just fine".

When they charged us the usual 10% service charge I couldn't help but tell them we weren't paying it due to extremely poor service. The waiter reported this to the manager, who immediately brushed him off with a condescending hand gesture. Obviously, they didn't bring the according change in regards to my request. We left.

It is very well located thou juices. But then, maybe they had just finished cleaning the juicer, that's all.
